mapper.sql: partner_pdt_id, product_id, partner_name, partner_price, earnest_money, total_price, serve_desc, re_periods, is_publish_status, create_time, update_time
mapper.select: select pp.detail_desc,pp.sale,ppp.total_price,ppp.partner_pdt_id, pp.album_pics,pp.sub_title,pp.description,pp.detail_title,ppp.partner_name, ppp.serve_desc from pms_product pp left join pms_partner_product ppp on pp.product_id = ppp.product_id where ppp.partner_pdt_id = #{partnerPdtId} and pp.deleted = 0;

select ppp.partner_pdt_id,ppp.product_id,ppp.partner_name,ppp.total_price, ppp.is_publish_status,ppp.create_time,pp.sale,pp.pic,ppp.partner_price,ppp.earnest_money from pms_product pp left join pms_partner_product ppp on pp.product_id = ppp.product_id where ppp.partner_pdt_id = #{partnerPdtId};
